message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to make a generous offer to you today. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $900,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $850,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $875,000. This is the best price I can offer at this point.
